text: HeLa , SCH07072 , and muSCH cells showed similar doubling patterns when 72 hr growth curves were plotted ( Figure S1A ) . Northern blot analysis showed that the RNA stability and RNA expression patterns of three marker genes ( GAPDH , actin , and VEGF ) in the three cell lines were not affected by expression of the 3D8 scFv protein ( Figure S1B ) . Taken together , expression of the 3D8 scFv protein in SCH07072 cells did not affect cell growth or viability .
